tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I recently had a fantastic experience at this dental clinic. The staff was incredibly welcoming and professional. The clinic's hygiene standards were impressive, and the dentist demonstrated expertise and care throughout my visit. I left feeling confident in their services and would highly recommend this clinic for comprehensive dental care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Visited Essence Dental for RCT last week. Found Dr Purva to be very knowledgeable, skilful and well versed in her work. She is professional yet empathetic in her treatment and took great pains to alleviate doubts regarding the dental issues and their treatment . Her ethical approach especially came as a breath of fresh air . The clinic was compact and clean with a clutter - free set up with a special mention of the very quotable quotes on the walls. Will heartily recommend to all for efficient treatment of dental problems with care and a smile.
reply_text: Thank you sir for your kind words

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
.It is my 3rd RCT, But i ve experienced few things for the first time. *** ** ***** ** **** ************* *** bond with the patient. She is against unnecessary antibiotics use and let body heal naturally.
2. Advance Technical equipments : she use live and quick x-ray before starting treatment to diagnose the problem. advance use of suction tools is my first time experience.
3.In my last appointment i felt very happy as my pain was gone and she made my smile beautiful.
